meanings.definition: The action or activity of attending a theater performance.
meanings.sent1: Theatergoing is a fun way to spend an evening with friends.
meanings.sent2: My family enjoys theatergoing on weekends.
meanings.sent3: Theatergoing can be a thrilling experience for all ages.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for theatergoing is like a flame that never dims.
meanings.sent5: Theatergoing brings stories to life right before your eyes.

meanings.definition: The practice or habit of going to the theater.
meanings.sent1: His theatergoing started when he was just a child.
meanings.sent2: Theatergoing has become a tradition in our family.
meanings.sent3: She takes her theatergoing seriously, always arriving early.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, theatergoing is a magical journey every time.
meanings.sent5: Theatergoing is like a delightful escape from reality.
